sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import Thumbnail from './Thumbnail.js'; // Import the Thumbnail component import '../css/App.css'; import {CSSTransition,TransitionGroup} from 'react-transition-group'; class Projects extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); const balancingRobot = { 'key':'balancingRobot', 'link':"/balancingRobot", 'image':require('./../content/projects/balancingRobot/thumbnail.png'), 'title':"Strip The Willow: Dancing Robot", 'question':"How can **Signal Processing** be used to create a **Dancing Robot**?", 'col':"col-md-4", 'category':['cod'], 'year':'April 2018' } const beatbox = { 'key':'beatbox', 'link':"/beatbox", 'image':require('./../content/projects/beatbox/thumbnail.jpg'), 'title':"Beatbox", 'question':"How can **Heart Rate** be visualised using **Mechatronics**?", 'col':"col-md-4", 'category':['cod'], 'year':'December 2017' } const bigData = { 'key':'bigData', 'link':"/bigData", 'image':require('./../content/projects/bigData/thumbnail.jpg'), 'title':"Big Data", 'question':"How can **Data Analytics** be used to **Explain and Predict** knife crime in London ?", 'col':"col-md-4", 'category':['cod'], 'year':'June 2018' } const blueNote = { 'key':'blueNote', 'link':"/blueNote", 'image':require('./../content/projects/blueNote/thumbnail.png'), 'title':"BlueNote", 'question':"How can **Bluetooth Low Energy** be used to **Deliver Timely Notifications**?", 'col':"col-md-4", 'category':['cod','str'], 'year':'January 2020' } const embla = { 'key':'embla', 'link':"/embla", 'image':require('./../content/projects/embla/thumbnail.png'), 'title':"Embla", 'question':"How can **Workplace Environments** be designed to **Reduce Stress**?", 'col':"col-md-8", 'category':['str','des'], 'year':'April 2019' } const joyStory = { 'key':'joyStory', 'link':"/joyStory", 'image':require('./../content/projects/joyStory/thumbnail.png'), 'title':"JoyStory", 'question':"How can **A Collaborative Game** be used to **Build Relationships**?", 'col':"col-md-4", 'category':['eng','str'], 'year':'March 2020' } const jumpingRobot = { 'key':'jumpingRobot', 'link':"/jumpingRobot", 'image':require('./../content/projects/jumpingRobot/thumbnail.png'), 'title':"LeapFrog", 'question':"How can **Mechanics, Finite Element Analysis and 3D Modelling** be used to design a **Jumping Robot**?", 'col':"col-md-4", 'category':['eng'], 'year':'April 2018' } const pacman = { 'key':'pacman', 'link':"/pacman", 'image':require('./../content/projects/pacman/thumbnail.png'), 'title':"Pacman", 'question':"How can **Algorithm Design** be used to **Optimise** Pacman?", 'col':"col-md-4", 'category':['cod'], 'year':'December 2016' } const panaseer = { 'key':'panaseer', 'link':"/panaseer", 'image':require('./../content/projects/panaseer/thumbnail.png'), 'title':"Panaseer", 'question':"How can a **novel innovation in food sensing** be used to help **Allergy Sufferers**?", 'col':"col-md-4", 'category':['des'], 'year':'March 2019' } const pause = { 'key':'pause', 'link':"/pause", 'image':require('./../content/projects/pause/thumbnail.png'), 'title':"Pause", 'question':"How can **Behavioural Psychology** be used to address **Social Media Addiction**?", 'col':"col-md-4", 'category':['des'], 'year':'March 2020' } const peoplePod = { 'key':'peoplePod', 'link':"/peoplePod", 'image':require('./../content/projects/peoplePod/thumbnail.jpeg'), 'title':"ModPod", 'question':"How can **Autnomous Vehichles** be used to tackle the **Last Mile Problem**?", 'col':"col-md-4", 'category':['str','des'], 'month':'June', 'year':'2016' } const revEng = { 'key':'revEng', 'link':"/revEng", 'image':require('./../content/projects/revEng/thumbnail.jpg'), 'title':"RevEng", 'question':"How can **Thermodynamics and Material Analysis** be used to make the **Products More Sustainable**?", 'col':"col-md-8", 'category':['str','eng'], 'month':'March', 'year':'2016' } const spiro = { 'key':'spiro', 'link':"/spiro", 'image':require('./../content/projects/spiro/thumbnail.png'), 'title':"Spiro", 'question':"How can a cost-effective way to **Measure Lung Capacity** be used to help **diagnose COPD globally**?", 'col':"col-md-4", 'category':['cod','str'], 'month':'June', 'year':'2017' } this.state = { activeFilter:[true,false,false,false,false], projects: [ balancingRobot,beatbox,bigData,blueNote,embla,joyStory,pacman,panaseer,revEng,jumpingRobot,pause,peoplePod,spiro ], } this.state.filterProjects=this.state.projects this.filter = this.filter.bind(this) } filter(i, category){ var activeFilter = [false,false,false,false,false]; activeFilter[i] = true; this.setState({ filterIndex:i, activeFilter:activeFilter, filterProjects:(category==='all') ? this.state.projects : this.state.projects.filter(project => project.category.includes(category)) }); } render() { const activeFilter = this.state.activeFilter return (
  • this.filter(0, 'all')}>All
  • this.filter(1, 'cod')}>Coding and Electronics
  • this.filter(2, 'des')}>Design
  • this.filter(3, 'eng')}>Engineering Analysis
  • this.filter(4, 'str')}>Enterprise, Strategy and Systems
{this.state.filterProjects.map((thumbnail) => ( ))}
) } } export default Projects;
